The  Accused  Appellant  was 
indicated  before 
the  High  Court  of  Balapitiya  on 
two  Counts
namely,
a)  Committing murder of Ranasinghe  Premadasa on 06th  April  2004,  an  offence punishable
under sec. 296 of the Penal Code.
b)  Causing hurt  to  one  Hewa Dewage  Gunawathie  during  the  same  transaction,  an  offence
punishable under sec. 316 of the Penal Code.
At  the  conclusion  of a  trial  before  the  High  Court Judge,  the  accused  was  found  guilty  on both
counts by the learned High Court Judge on 21th October 2010 and sentenced as follows,
a).  Count  1- Death  Sentence
